meanings.definition: Consisting of or characterized by lobes.
meanings.sent1: The multilobed structure of the building provided interesting architectural details.
meanings.sent2: The multilobed leaf had a unique appearance due to its lobes.
meanings.sent3: The multilobed puzzle was challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her multilobed necklace showcased intricate lobe designs.
meanings.sent5: The multilobed mountain range stood majestically in the distance.
